description: Backend JWT guard (SEC-002-T1) requires the AWS Cognito User Pool (INF-002-T1) to exist to fetch the JWKS URI for token validation.
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provide Cognito ARN and JWKS URI to backend team as soon as it's provisioned.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks implementation of all secure backend APIs.

description: The Redux slice for the calculator (FE-001-S1) depends on the core Expression Evaluation Service (FE-008-T2) to perform calculations.
mitigation_plan: Develop the service and its interface first, allowing the Redux slice to be built against a stable contract.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire core calculator feature.

description: The backend API for invoking formula execution (SEC-005-T1) is dependent on the AWS Lambda handler (SEC-003-T1) being developed and deployed.
mitigation_plan: Develop a mock Lambda interface in the NestJS backend for parallel development and integration testing before the real Lambda is ready.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire custom mode execution feature.

description: The E2E test for offline history persistence (TEST-E2E-03) cannot be created until the offline queuing feature (US060-T1) is fully implemented.
mitigation_plan: QA engineer to pair with frontend developer during implementation to understand IndexedDB structure and build test stubs early.
impact_if_delayed: Reduces confidence in the offline sync feature's reliability.
